title: For Fitness Buffs and Landlords, Gyms Are Hot Again
description: Hoping to capitalize on a renewed interest in communal experiences, fitness chains are reconfiguring their spaces, offering more room to exercise and better amenities.
dc:creator: Jane Margolies
media:credit: Lanna Apisukh for The New York Times
media:description: Jenny Radke, an actress known as Jenny Laroche, at the Life Time health club in New York, which won her over with its Kids Academy.
